channel.title: Javascript on My Blog Space.
channel.description: Recent content in Javascript on My Blog Space.

item.title: Arrayオブジェクト（配列を操作する）
item.description: var array = ["javascript", "php", "ruby", "python"]; console.log(array); var array = ["javascript", "php", "ruby", "python"]; console.log(array); var array = new Array("javascript", "php", "ruby", "python"); console.log(array); var array = new Array(); console.log(array); var array = []; console.log(array); var array = new Array(10); console.log(array); Arrayオブジェクトの主なメンバ var array1 = ["html", "css", "javascript"]; var array2 = ["php", "ruby", "python", "java"]; var str = "文字列です。"; 基本 length（長さ）, isArray, toString, toLocalString, console.log(array1.length); console.log(Array.isArray(str)); console.
